title: Samsung Galaxy S22 Plus Display Review: Vision Booster is a Game Changer
content:
Every year, Samsung loves to show off just how much brighter its new flagships get. Although they’re unquestionably revered as the spearhead in mobile screen technology, the best smartphone displays — in my opinion — haven’t typically been found in Samsung’s own phones. The Korean giant boasts ever-inflating figures for “peak brightness” (which by themselves

The post Samsung Galaxy S22 Plus Display Review: Vision Booster is a Game Changer appeared first on xda-developers.
description: The Samsung Galaxy S22 Plus has class-leading HDR10 performance on smartphones. Read on as we deep dive into this OLED in our display review.
